subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeff Carter and Sami Kapanen scored and Martin Biron made 29 saves to lead the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-1 win over the visiting Islanders last night.
snippet: Jeff Carter and Sami Kapanen scored and Martin Biron made 29 saves to lead the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-1 win over the visiting Islanders last night.
